title: HRBP (Production & Supply Chain) & Talent Acquisition Specialist
description:
Want to join us as we move closer to be a leader in all markets in which we operate, as a pioneering tech company?

Weâ€™re looking for bright, intellectually curious young professionals ready to bring out the best in themselves to kick off an exciting career devoid of corporate buzzwords and bureaucracy. Instead, we offer real-life cases to resolve and a true taste of professional life in a high-growth, high-speed tech company.

If you want to hold full accountability of your work, if you want to be heard when you have new ideas to contribute to the business, and if youâ€™re ready to experience an exceptional on-the-job training; then youâ€™re ready for the challenge.

ğŸ¯Your Journey Begins: Embrace the Exciting Adventure Ahead!

  • Executing end-to-end (White & Blue Collar) recruitment cycle to ensure a consistent flow of right candidates for the business, an exceptional journey for the candidates, and timely results for the hiring managers
  • Ensuring management of consultancy processes
  • Creating ad hoc reports on recruitment KPIs, by actively using our ATS (applicant tracking system)  
  • Mapping the passive candidates in the industry to create talent-pipelines for prospective business needs
  • Manage and resolve complex employee relations issues
  • Make exit interviews for voluntary submissions and prepare reports
  • Visiting the production center which is located in (Gebze & Pendik) at least 1 or 2 days per week
    • ,

    âœ¨Let Your Skills Shine with Us!

  • You're comfortable with learning on the fly, tech-savvy, and resourceful 
  • Youâ€™re a problem solver
  • You have good communication skills
  • You're an excellent content producer with an eye for details 
  • You're skilled at documenting & presenting your assignments 
  • You're a top-notch recruiter with analytical and creative skills
    • ,

    ğŸ¥°Are You the One Weâ€™re Seeking?

  • BA/BSc degree in relevant academic disciplines
  • 2-3 years of experience in recruitment (white & blue collar) in a high-speed, high-growth environment
  • Advanced skills in MS Office Programs 
  • Strong ability to research and follow-up, successful time management, strong analysis, and reporting skills
    • ,

    ğŸ˜Whatâ€™s in here for you?

  • ğŸ‰Fun and Adventure Await: Get ready for exhilarating team adventures and unforgettable company activities that will create memories to cherish! ğŸŒˆ
  • ğŸŒŸDive into an Exciting World of Entertainment! : Netflix, BluTV, YouTube Premium, and More! ğŸ¬ğŸ¿
  • ğŸ©Express Your Unique Style: No more stuffy suits or uncomfortable attire. Embrace your personal style and wear whatever makes you feel confident and comfortable. ğŸ‘—ğŸ‘•
  • ğŸ“šUnlock Your Potential: Biweekly Learning Hours and a Vast Training Library Await! ğŸ“ Never stop learning and growing! With unlimited access to top-notch training resources like Udemy and more, your professional growth knows no limits! ğŸš€
  • ğŸ¥°Join Vibrant Social Clubs: Connect, Collaborate, and Create Lifelong Friendships!ğŸ‰Be part of our vibrant social clubs, where you can engage with colleagues who share your passions and interests. Cultivate meaningful connections, foster collaboration, and create memories that extend beyond the workplace.ğŸ¤
  • ğŸ¤Seamless Onboarding: Receive a Warm Welcome and a Smooth Transition! ğŸ“‹ Our dedicated onboarding process ensures you feel supported and empowered from day one. We provide comprehensive training and resources to help you settle into your role quickly and effectively. ğŸŒŸ
  • Join us on this exciting journey where remote work, a dynamic work ecosystem, thrilling team activities, entertainment galore, a flexible dress code, and endless learning opportunities await you! Itâ€™s time to unleash your full potential and embrace the future of work! ğŸ’ƒ
    • ğŸ˜About Us

    As a pioneering tech company in gifts, our vision is to be a leader in all markets in which we operate. We create lifelong value in the lives of our employees, customers and all our business partners! ğŸ’ª

    Founded in 2006 by Emre AydÄ±n, Ciceksepeti.com offers the broadest selection of flowers & gifts delivered same day within a single experience. We are very proud to have created a culture of celebration among people with our gift arrangements and our brand Bonnyfood. We are committed to continuing this tradition by making every special day memorable. In addition to our original mission of bringing a new perspective to the e-commerce sector in Turkey and making shipping faster and easier, now we offer a diverse range of products under various categories, such as electronics, home & living, personal care, supermarket, cosmetics, fashion, sports & outdoor, hobby, pet shop, jewellery & accessories, as well as flowers and edible flowers since 2019.

    Ciceksepeti.com is the most visited floral and gifting website according to SimilarWeb data, having 4 times more visitors than the second largest player in the world. ğŸ˜

    Besides covering 70+ cities in Turkey through 55.000+ vendors and 24x7 customer support, Ciceksepeti has expanded into Mexico with its international brand, LolaFlora.ğŸ’ƒ

    We are so happy and proud to have been selected the Best Employer Brand at LinkedIn Turkey Talent Awards in 2019 and 2022! ğŸ¥³

    Headquartered in Ä°stanbul, weâ€™re a young, nimble, dedicated team of professionals, who are not only hard workers but also smart workers; who know how to get things done in the right way, as well as getting the right things done for our customers. Moreover, weâ€™re on the verge of an exciting episode in our journey as we simultaneously set foot on international markets and grow further in domestic market.
